00149 /*
00150  * Shared Memory Layout:
00151  *
00152  *    ________
00153  *   | Header |
00154  *   |--------|
00155  *   | GUARDH |
00156  *   |--------|
00157  *   | Index  |
00158  *   |        |
00159  *   |        |
00160  *   |--------|
00161  *   | GUARDI |
00162  *   |--------|
00163  *   |  Data  |
00164  *   |        |
00165  *   |        |
00166  *   |        |
00167  *   |        |
00168  *   |        |
00169  *   |        |
00170  *   |--------|
00171  *   | GUARDD |
00172  *   |________|
00173  */
00174

00215 #define ACH_SHM_MAGIC_NUM 0xb07511f3

00223 #define ACH_SHM_GUARD_HEADER_NUM ((uint64_t)0x1A2A3A4A5A6A7A8ALLU)
00224 
00229 #define ACH_SHM_GUARD_INDEX_NUM ((uint64_t)0x1B2B3B4B5B6B7B8BLLU)

00237 #define ACH_SHM_GUARD_DATA_NUM ((uint64_t)0x1C2C3C4C5C6C7C8CLLU)

00240     typedef enum ach_status {
00241         ACH_OK = 0,             
00242         ACH_OVERFLOW = 1,       
00243         ACH_INVALID_NAME = 2,   
00244         ACH_BAD_SHM_FILE = 3,   
00245         ACH_FAILED_SYSCALL = 4, 
00246         ACH_STALE_FRAMES = 5,   
00247         ACH_MISSED_FRAME = 6,   
00248         ACH_TIMEOUT = 7,        
00249         ACH_EEXIST = 8,         
00250         ACH_ENOENT = 9,         
00251         ACH_CLOSED = 10,
00252         ACH_BUG = 11,
00253         ACH_EINVAL = 12,
00254         ACH_CORRUPT = 13
00255     } ach_status_t;

00262     typedef enum {
00269         ACH_O_WAIT = 0x01,
00275         ACH_O_LAST = 0x02,
00276         ACH_O_COPY = 0x04,
00277     } ach_get_opts_t;

00284     typedef struct {
00285         uint32_t magic;          
00286         size_t len;              
00287         char name[1+ACH_CHAN_NAME_MAX]; 
00288         union {
00289             struct {
00290                 size_t index_cnt;        
00291                 size_t data_size;        
00292                 size_t data_head;        
00293                 size_t data_free;        
00294                 size_t index_head;       
00295                 size_t index_free;       
00296                 int anon;                
00297             };
00298             uint64_t reserved[16];  
00299         };
00300         struct /* anonymous structure */ {
00301             pthread_mutex_t mutex;         
00302             pthread_cond_t cond;           
00303             int dirty;
00304         } sync;                   
00305         /* should force our alignment to 8-bytes... */
00306         uint64_t last_seq;        
00307     } ach_header_t;
00308 
00311     typedef struct {
00312         size_t size;      
00313         size_t offset;    
00314         uint64_t seq_num; 
00315     } ach_index_t ;
00316 
00317 
00319     typedef struct {
00320         union {
00321             struct{
00322                 int map_anon;        
00323                 ach_header_t *shm;   
00324             };
00325             uint64_t reserved_size[8]; 
00326         };
00327     } ach_attr_t;
00328 
00330     typedef struct {
00331         union {
00332             struct{
00333                 int map_anon;      
00334                 ach_header_t *shm; 
00335                 int truncate;      
00336                 int set_clock;     
00337                 clockid_t clock;   
00339             };
00340             uint64_t reserved[16]; 
00341         };
00342     } ach_create_attr_t;
00343 
00346     typedef struct {
00347         union {
00348             struct {
00349                 ach_header_t *shm;   
00350                 size_t len;          
00351                 int fd;              
00352                 uint64_t seq_num;    
00353                 size_t next_index;   
00354                 ach_attr_t attr;     
00355             };
00356             uint64_t reserved[16]; 
00357         };
00358     } ach_channel_t;
00359 
00361     extern size_t ach_channel_size;
00363     extern size_t ach_attr_size;
00364 
00366 #define ACH_SHM_GUARD_HEADER( shm ) ((uint64_t*)((ach_header_t*)(shm) + 1))
00367 
00369 #define ACH_SHM_INDEX( shm ) ((ach_index_t*)(ACH_SHM_GUARD_HEADER(shm) + 1))
00370 
00372 #define ACH_SHM_GUARD_INDEX( shm )                                      \
00373     ((uint64_t*)(ACH_SHM_INDEX(shm) + ((ach_header_t*)(shm))->index_cnt))
00374 
00376 #define ACH_SHM_DATA( shm ) ( (uint8_t*)(ACH_SHM_GUARD_INDEX(shm) + 1) )
00377 
00379 #define ACH_SHM_GUARD_DATA( shm )                                       \
00380     ((uint64_t*)(ACH_SHM_DATA(shm) + ((ach_header_t*)(shm))->data_size))
